short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Sets your browser's default search to SearchLock: the anonymous, encrypted search engine.
short.de: Sorgen Sie dafür, dass Ihre Websuchanfragen privat bleiben: mit SearchLock, einem anonymen und verschlüsselten Suchmaschinen- und…
short.es: Mantenga la privacidad de su historial de búsqueda con SearchLock, el buscador y la herramienta de privacidad anónima y cifrada.
short.fr: Gardez votre historique de recherche confidentiel avec SearchLock : le moteur de recherche et outil de confidentialité anonyme et…
short.pt_BR: Mantenha o seu histórico de pesquisas privado com o SearchLock: a ferramenta de privacidade e motor de busca anónimo e encriptado.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online privacy with SearchLock | Default Search. This extension sets SearchLock as your default search engine in Chrome, providing a secure and private search experience.

Key Features:
- Set SearchLock as Your Default: Instantly set SearchLock as your default search engine in Chrome with a single click.
- Privacy-Focused: SearchLock doesn’t track you or your searches, ensuring your data stays private.
- Simple Setup: Quickly install and easily configure SearchLock as your default search engine.

Why Use SearchLock?
- Privacy First: With SearchLock, your searches are private. No personal data is collected or sold.
- Neutral Search Results: Get unbiased search results without interference from algorithms designed to profit off your data.
- Secure Browsing: Enjoy a safe, secure, and anonymous way to browse the web, knowing your search activity isn’t being exploited.

Make the switch to a secure and privacy-friendly search engine with SearchLock. Download the extension today and set SearchLock as your default search engine for a better browsing experience!
